errors.error_large_qubit_number: There is no qubit with the number {qubit}. The largest number to access a qubit from this data is {max_qubits}!
errors.error_negative_qubit_number: Qubit numbers cannot be lower than 0! The number {qubit} goes against this!
errors.error-no-qubits-numbers: At least one qubit number must be given in order to retrieve noise data!
errors.error_not_linked: There is no linked {class_name} object! Please use the method {method_name}(object: {class_name}) before executing this method!
errors.no_key_noise_data_instance: There is no currently available noise data instance with the reference key '{reference_key}'!
errors.no_key_noise_model_instance: There is no currently available noise model instance with the reference key '{reference_key}'!
errors.no_key_simulator_instance: There is no currently available simulator instance with the reference key '{reference_key}'!

adding_errors.text: Creating and adding depolarizing, thermal relaxation, and readout errors.

created_new_object.text: {class_name} class object has been created successfully!

created_noise_model.text: Noise model has been created successfully! It can now be accessed with the following reference key: {reference_key}.

created_simulator.text: Simulator has been created successfully! It can now be accessed with the following reference key: {reference_key}.

deleted_noise_data_instance.text: The noise data instance {reference_key} has been deleted successfully!

deleted_simulator_instance.text: The simulator instance {reference_key} has been deleted successfully!

highlightables: AN EXCEPTION HAS OCCURED. PLEASE VIEW THE ERROR LOG FOR MORE DETAILS!

executing_simulator.text: Executing {qubit_count} qubit circuit with {shots} shots on the simulator {reference_key}.

execution_complete.text: Circuit execution completed successfully! Result job has been returned!

import_csv.text: Continue by importing the QPU calibration data CSV file: object.import_csv_data('path/to/file.csv').

import_csv_file_information.text: Importing noise data from the CSV file {file_name} located at the following path: {file_path}.

reset_time.text: CSV files currently do not contain Reset operation times. A default value of 1300 ns has been set.

successful_csv_import.text: Data from CSV file has been imported successfully! It can now be accessed with the following reference key: {reference_key}.

transpiling_circuit.text: Transpiling circuit with optimization level {optimization_level} for simulator execution.

qubit_noise_data_retrieved.text: Noise data for all requested qubits from the instance {reference_key} has been retrieved successfully!
